div.p: C.L.H., D.G., and C.P. conceived the project using the data from the study site where C.P. is principal investigator. C.L.H. developed the theory behind the manuscript and performed the data analyses. D.G., F.G., and C.P. had major input in technical discussions with C.L.H. C.L.H. wrote the first draft of the manuscript, for which all authors contributed substantially to revisions.
